page.title: 03HANSLOPE SCHOOL
page.content:
Hanslope school is 17 years old. The first school was built in 1968 and the middle school was built in 1974. At school we have break time, it starts at quarter to eleven and finishes at eleven, and an hour later we have dinner time. We've got lots of work to do, some times we stay in at break time if we haven't done enough work. We do study on Tuesdays and Fridays. We are at school for 6 hours from 9:00 to 3:05. There are some clubs after school. I'm going to athletics. So is my brother.My Mum picks us up from school.
by Adrian Tutin.
